The Wisconsin Democracy Campaign dubbed: Influence peddler of the month" in January 2019.
Matt Rothschild: the executive director of the Wisconsin Democracy Campaign, stated that the NRA is one of the biggest lobbyists in the capital and spends a significant amount of money during elections.
The NRA: s Political Victory Fund spending reports, available on the Wisconsin Campaign Finance Information System webpage, were used to verify the claim.
The Wisconsin Ethics Commission: s report on lobbying expenditures showed that the NRA spent $126,987 on lobbying, ranking 109 out of 793 groups, indicating that it is not one of the biggest spenders in lobbying.
